context: Block operates Square (seller ecosystem), Cash App (consumer finance), Afterpay (BNPL), TIDAL, and Bitcoin mining. Cash App has 55M+ monthly actives with banking and investing features.

competitors.name: Shopify
competitors.notes: Commerce platform with payments and POS

competitors.name: Chime
competitors.notes: Neobank competing with Cash App banking

competitors.name: Apple Pay
competitors.notes: Tap to Pay threatening Square hardware
